On this special day, I thought to give a special treat to all of you so I prepared and presented Yummy Homemade Ice Cream which is simple and delicious ğŸ˜‹ It will take few minutes to prepare the base and rest of the process in refrigerator. I prepared a base ice cream to this you can add enumber of combinations as you like and love to have them with your ice cream. Today I prepared two flavours of ice cream ingredients I used are handy in almost every ones home, Choco chips caramel Ice cream & Hazelnut ice cream. Duration: 20 mins Freezing time: 8 to 10 hrs Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Heavy Whipping Cream - 1 tin - 473 ml - cold Condensed Milk - 1 tin - 400 gms - cold Choco chip Caramel Ice cream: Semi sweetened Choco chips/ morsels : 2 tb sp Caramel - 2 tb sp Hazelnut Ice cream: Hazelnut spread - 3 tb sp Chocolate Hazelnut rolled wafers - 4 Procedure:
  • Take a deep bowl
  • Add whipping cream and condensed milk
  • Mix it well till incorporated and stiff peaks by using hand mixer
  • Ice cream base ready
  • Transfer base ice cream in two different airtight containers
Choco chips caramel Ice cream:
  • Add Choco chips and caramel in first container
  • Mix well & close it
  • Keep it aside
Chocolate Hazelnut Ice cream:
  • Add hazelnut spread in another container
  • Mix well till it the ice cream base changes to chocolate color & close it
  • Keep it aside
  • Next place two airtight containers in Deep Fridge
  • Freeze atleast 8 to 10 hrs or freeze overnight for best results
Serving Ice cream:
  • Take out ice cream containers from refrigerator
  • Take a scoop & bowls
  • Add one scoop in each bowl
  • Garnish with caramel on Choco chip caramel ice cream
  • Garnish hazelnut spread on Hazelnut Ice Cream
  • Finally add chocolate hazelnut rolled wafers on each ice cream
  • Serve to your kids & family members ğŸ˜‹
